meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kenji Shimizu Sarah Von Oeyen Steven Grade Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7959.

td.p: Kenji Shimizu, a biomedical engineer from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Sarah Von Oeyen, a librarian from Troy, Michigan
Steven Grade, a sports industry consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,600)

tr.td: MOVEABLE FEASTS?
FILM DIRECTORS
WE WOULD HAVE ALSO ACCEPTED...
NAME THAT NOVELIST!
THE WESTERN U.S.
PUT A "RING" ON IT
